name: Perpetual Heart
description: Some theorize that the symbols on these cores have knowledge and logic inscribed upon them in a language that eyes cannot perceive. Some go a step further and believe that these unique Ruin machines autonomously decided to forsake a biomimetic form to pursue strength of function on account of their especially large cores and complex inscriptions.
source: Dropped by Lv. 30+ Perpetual Mechanical Arrays
Dropped by Lv. 30+ Perpetual Mechanical Arrays
